方法详细信息

splitTables

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> splitTables(java.lang.String tables)
Split the table string(Usually contains names of some tables) to a List that is formated. example: tbl[0-32] will be splitted into tbl0, tbl1, tbl2, ... ,tbl32 in List

参数：
tables - a string contains table name(one or many).
返回：
a split result of table name.
抛出：
RerunableException

copyParam

public static PluginParam copyParam(PluginParam iParam)
Copy param whose type is PluginParam.

参数：
iParam - param(PluginParam type) needs to copy.
返回：
a copy result.
